data.actual_result: The box turns green as if a game was detected
data.expected_result: Besides the known bugs involving UI elements being misplaced/missing after toggling split screen, the box should stay grey at least to show that no games are detected
data.short_description: The box where detected game appears in Games settings turns green when toggling split screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Settings > Games  - Make sure no game is being detected - Toggle split screen (Android 7 feature)
